description:
This week I visited my friend Alister Atkin to find out more about the birthing story of some of my favourite guitars. It started in a garage with victorian cribs; who knew?   

https://atkinguitars.com/guitar/jh3001/

'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March - and we'll be going on tour:  
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
Our single, The Longest Kiss is here:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka9Fqc11mX?si=ab25d61ba0c74618

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory
title: Atkin Guitars Tour
